title: CryptoHFs
author: CryptoHFs
content: Do you know any crypto marketing agencies?Please list the ones you trust not google onesWe are looking to outsource a crypto hedge fund marketingBudget $1,000,000

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: I offer social media marketing, independently, but I can introduce you to reputable agencies. Let's have a call on Telegram: @ElevatedWarrior

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: if you have a portfolio you are more than welcome to share it in a private message

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: If you've got a lot of time to browse, go to Services. From there, you'll get to see a lot of marketing services that's being offered by an individual and even by a group. Most portfolios are there for each thread that you will see and the trust feed back, responses and reviews on those threads are gonna help you out based on their past transactions and services offered to contractors/clients.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on March 14, 2023, 05:51:28 AMDo you know any crypto marketing agencies?Please list the ones you trust not google onesWe are looking to outsource a crypto hedge fund marketingBudget $1,000,000Did I read it right $1 million for a marketing budget if the price is right then this could be a big company are they going to be affiliated or you will hire people to promote without using any affiliate links, $1 million is a huge budget you have to make it clear if the rewards are based on the action of the promoters and generated by their recruits like they have a share of their recruits' investments or they will act as a third party without working as an affiliate.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: There's no affiliate rewards.We are looking for a company that understand crypto better than us to outsource the project to it.They will need to run ads, get influencers and more.This means that this budget is ad spend budget not affiliate rewards.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on March 16, 2023, 06:23:24 AMThere's no affiliate rewards.We are looking for a company that understand crypto better than us to outsource the project to it.They will need to run ads, get influencers and more.This means that this budget is ad spend budget not affiliate rewards.Then you need to go at services tab like sunsilk has saidÂ Quote from: sunsilk on March 14, 2023, 09:01:43 PMIf you've got a lot of time to browse, go to Services. From there, you'll get to see a lot of marketing services that's being offered by an individual and even by a group. Most portfolios are there for each thread that you will see and the trust feed back, responses and reviews on those threads are gonna help you out based on their past transactions and services offered to contractors/clients.beware of scammers I don't know but maybe there is dozen of people who tried to contact you right now, especially after you have budget 1 Million dollar that is a huge money dude

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: I personally don't have any direct experience with crypto marketing agencies, but I thinks there are some good ones out there. But, you need to make guidelines marketing your projects, like a social media, article content or video campaign. And try to use in with low budget first. Then, it depends on your agreement with agencies marketing.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: There are tons of managers here on the forum including myself who can help depending on your needs/wants. $1,000,000 budget. Is that in crypto?Which coin?Is there a website people can check out? Do you and your team have profiles we can check? LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Discord, or anything?I have more questions but let's start there.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on March 27, 2023, 08:52:44 PMThere are tons of managers here on the forum including myself who can help depending on your needs/wants. $1,000,000 budget. Is that in crypto?Which coin?Is there a website people can check out? Do you and your team have profiles we can check? LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Discord, or anything?I have more questions but let's start there.1- usdt2- website upon choosing the manager3- yes, we can arrange a zoom with the project owners once we find the right manager

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on March 27, 2023, 09:34:04 PM1- usdt2- website upon choosing the manager3- yes, we can arrange a zoom with the project owners once we find the right managerhonestly, it is very hard to believe that someone who has $1 million for marketing, in a stable real currency, not in some worthless project (shit) token, in this way, he is looking for an agency. $1mill is serious money even for many big companies with serious, developed businesses. I believe that there should be a much more serious approach and presented more concrete ideas of what is expected from someone who owns such an amount.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 27, 2023, 09:47:28 PMQuote from: CryptoHFs on March 27, 2023, 09:34:04 PM1- usdt2- website upon choosing the manager3- yes, we can arrange a zoom with the project owners once we find the right managerhonestly, it is very hard to believe that someone who has $1 million for marketing, in a stable real currency, not in some worthless project (shit) token, in this way, he is looking for an agency. $1mill is serious money even for many big companies with serious, developed businesses. I believe that there should be a much more serious approach and presented more concrete ideas of what is expected from someone who owns such an amount.we work for a marketing company that has a potential client who wants to launch his crypto hedge fund while the company confirmed that we are not experienced in crypto marketing he accepted to be done under our supervision so we search our way to find who we can outsource the project to for a percentagethank you

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on March 27, 2023, 09:52:26 PMwe work for a marketing company that has a potential client who wants to launch his crypto hedge fund while the company confirmed that we are not experienced in crypto marketing he accepted to be done under our supervision so we search our way to find who we can outsource the project to for a percentagethank youWith a 0ne million Budget ending up in a Forum to solicite a marketing company specialized in crypto? How many companies with Crypto experience hang out on Bitcointalk? What do you think?

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: WillyAp on March 27, 2023, 09:56:17 PMQuote from: CryptoHFs on March 27, 2023, 09:52:26 PMwe work for a marketing company that has a potential client who wants to launch his crypto hedge fund while the company confirmed that we are not experienced in crypto marketing he accepted to be done under our supervision so we search our way to find who we can outsource the project to for a percentagethank youWith a 0ne million Budget ending up in a Forum to solicite a marketing company specialized in crypto? How many companies with Crypto experience hang out on Bitcointalk? What do you think? searching everywhere possible is not a bad idea

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on March 27, 2023, 09:59:00 PMsearching everywhere possible is not a bad ideaSure but first you need to have a pretty good profile till a hot shot marketing company bends even a finger. Imagine you are the hot shot company and I wish to have a million dollar marketeer working for me.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: So how is it now, it's been 2 weeks since you posted this offer, have you found the right marketing team to promote your platform, this is a $1 million budget marketing project I'm sure it will have a huge impact on the Cryptocurrency community many here are also interested to know what kind of platform do you have.If you found the right marketing team it's time to lock this thread but it's better to work on at least three marketing teams to maximize the promotion.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on March 27, 2023, 10:53:22 PMSo how is it now, it's been 2 weeks since you posted this offer, have you found the right marketing team to promote your platform, this is a $1 million budget marketing project I'm sure it will have a huge impact on the Cryptocurrency community many here are also interested to know what kind of platform do you have.If you found the right marketing team it's time to lock this thread but it's better to work on at least three marketing teams to maximize the promotion. the team spoke to some that reached the zoom meeting level but not through bitcointalk and still discussing.for sure the thread will be closed once we sort it in full

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on March 27, 2023, 09:52:26 PMwe work for a marketing company that has a potential client who wants to launch his crypto hedge fund while the company confirmed that we are not experienced in crypto marketing he accepted to be done under our supervision so we search our way to find who we can outsource the project to for a percentagethat's why everything is strange to me. you started with a figure of $1 million, without demanding more precise answers. a marketing campaign for a crypto business is not much different from any other niche, and a solid agency probably already knows that. I would have expected that you were looking for information about relevant media, crypto influencers, important keywords, etc.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on March 27, 2023, 09:34:04 PM3- yes, we can arrange a zoom with the project owners once we find the right managerVery difficult when you are looking for a crypto marketing agency on bitcointalk. I don't think many will agree to do it. At least not me. Just few weeks ago I denied an investment offer of over 7 BTC in one of my personal project because they wanted to have a zoom meeting with me. If anyone wants to do business with me then they have my forum history. Visit my profile and check everything that I have open from years.If you can convince the team that the forum history is enough then I would love to check your project, discuss in group chat on telegram. I can offer you any sort of crypto marketing with the connections I have from over the years of bitcointalk marketing experience. I can even offer you billboard advertising in the busiest place of the world (I am sure with a million dollar advertising budget, this will be a great addition). Article publications on platforms like Business Insider, AP News, MarketWatch, StreetInsiders, Newsmax, yahoo websites, blockchain sites and many more.Feel free to visit my service page. Most of the things are wide open. The projects I have worked with and working with right now, everything you can explore. If you find me exception than everyone else, feel free to contact me.I wish the best for your project no matter if we work together or not.Cheers,

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 27, 2023, 11:52:01 PMQuote from: CryptoHFs on March 27, 2023, 09:52:26 PMwe work for a marketing company that has a potential client who wants to launch his crypto hedge fund while the company confirmed that we are not experienced in crypto marketing he accepted to be done under our supervision so we search our way to find who we can outsource the project to for a percentagethat's why everything is strange to me. you started with a figure of $1 million, without demanding more precise answers. a marketing campaign for a crypto business is not much different from any other niche, and a solid agency probably already knows that. I would have expected that you were looking for information about relevant media, crypto influencers, important keywords, etc.it is not the same you are missing a lotcrypto ads need cloaking to run if you are not licensedcrypto influencers most of the time don't follow the script you give themcrypto influencers may take the upfront payment and ask for more money otherwise they will not do the video and will not return anythingthere is a lot going with crypto market that you don't know until you try to do marketing you will discover the dark sideso when you search for a company that's specialized in crypto marketing they bear that risk and they are forced to execute the deal you have together no matter what happens on their sidethere is a lot of things to say about crypto market but simply it is not simple as you think
